title: Perfect Harmony
description:
When music major Madisen Hallberg was asked to sing the National Anthem for her college’s virtual graduation ceremony, she jumped at the chance. Little did she know it would lead to a serendipitous meeting that would capture the attention of the entire nation.

Follow Madisen on Instagram and TikTok

Listen to “Baby In Blue” on Spotify


Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
